name: 苍夜
description: 整合了北方王国而崛起的国家鲁兹，其贤者终结战争并促成鲁兹为“和平守护国”的形势，而今突然战乱又起，贤者却失去踪迹，究竟又是谁在煽动？
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 540 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
